data.name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service
data.detailed_description:
Alpha Sign-Up & Wishlist

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1011670/Totally_Reliable_Delivery_Service/
We will be doing an extensive Alpha test for Totally Reliable Delivery Service soon. This is to test online networking and technical performance of the game. If you'd like to participate, sign-up at http://trdsgame.com


About the Game



Buckle up your back brace and fire up the delivery truck, it's time to deliver! Join up to four friends and haphazardly get the job done in an interactive sandbox world.

Delivery attempted, that's a Totally Reliable Delivery Service guarantee!

FEATURES:

  • Local and Online Multiplayer: Go it alone to ensure the safety of your deliveries, or join your friends and put your teamwork to the test.
  • Controlled Noodly Chaos: Unpredictable ragdoll physics meets snappy platforming. Sprint, leap, dive, and grapple with ease, but collide with something and you'll be knocked out cold!
  • A World of Distractions: Take a break from deliveries and play around! The world is chock full of toys, vehicles, and machines that can be used for work or play.
  • Ragtag Crew: Customize your blue-collar workers and get your rear into gear, it's time to deliver!

data.short_description: Delivery Attempted. That's the Totally Reliable Delivery Service guarantee! T.R.D.S. is a ragdoll physics simulation about terrible package delivery couriers. Work together using odd machinery, useful gadgets, and the wonders of physics to reliably deliver packages to their destination.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560, Radeon HD 5870 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770k, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060, Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 650m or equivalent
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560, Radeon HD 5870 or newer
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
